metadata.synopsis: One lner where Lumbar is reacting to a player punching him after he's been payed to allow it.
metadata.how_to_trigger: Go to lumbar in CTY_Main_A 120; 45; -62Talk to Lumbar, pay him to have him allow you to punch himDo an unarmed attack in gameplay

0.speaker: Strange Beggar Lumbar
0.text: You don't pull your punches, do you?
0.context: CinematicNodeContext: The player punches the beggar hard in the chest. He staggers with the impact, but remains standing and apparently unharmed. (Bronze anims)

1.speaker: Strange Beggar Lumbar
1.context: CinematicNodeContext: The player punches the beggar hard in the chest. He staggers with the impact, but remains standing and apparently unharmed. (Bronze anims)NodeContext: Impressed
